```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(macleish)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)

macleish_trails <- macleish_layers %>%
  pluck("trails")

trails_leaflet <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addPolylines(data = macleish_trails, color = ~pal(macleish_trails$name)) 
  
trails_leaflet
```

```{r}
elevation <- macleish_layers %>%
  pluck("contours_3m") %>%
  st_transform(4326)
```

```{r message=FALSE}
elevation_trails <- macleish_trails %>%
  st_intersection(elevation)
```

```{r}
elevation_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addPolylines(data = macleish_trails) %>%
  addPolygons(data = elevation)

elevation_map
```
